Articles.Content: I was wondering if I should buy Farming Sim 2013, because of it's funny glitches and to try out the gameplay. So I was wondering if any of you would recommend it or a (mac) game like it.
Don't buy it, I did but I only got 2 hours out of it
If you're going to buy a farming simulator, I would recommend, John Deere: American Farmer instead
Don't buy it, how about going to a farm and convincing a farmer for you to sit in one of those automated ones.
